column2: *You are surprised to find out that this ship's captain is the Rogue who was doing mass on the Moon. You think his name was Foorko.* Human captain... I see your situation is grave.
That's right, Foorko. But we're holding.
I've come to help you. Ask your questions later. And try not to hit us. *Foorko signs off. His ship slowly approaches the battlefield.*
He's weird. But his help is welcome.
